title: Looking to trade slabs for raw
author: Jason19th

posts.post_title: Looking to trade slabs for raw
posts.post_content:
I have started a rough binder set and have picked up a couple of slabs along the way. Have decided to go no slabs in the collection and I am looking to trade for raw commons stars Hofers 

I am only about 80 cards in so if you have it I probably need it. Looking for cards that are trimmed, marked, scrapbooked or punched

Will send PM.

Are these your only slabs ?
